column2: XML line. Related Salesforce field API name is contained within the tags. NOTE: Salesforce field should be in all lowercase.
column3: Contains the Element that the line is stored in.
column4: Related Salesforce field API Name (all lowercase). Used for matching purposes.
column6: The order in which the line should be built. (Double)
column7: Uses the XML Full Name in the final XML, instead of replacing with a value from Salesforce.
